member.summary: Builds a new export package using the import/export. The resulting zip will be placed in folder determined by parameter and named accordingly to .

remarks.para: In the process of export package creation a temporary folder is necessary. The folder is determined by parameter. Any contents of such folder are likely to be deleted before and after the package creation, thus do not use it for storing any useful data.
All necessary folders are created before the export starts, if they do not exist already.

member.exception: Can be thrown when creating necessary folder structure.
Can be thrown when creating necessary folder structure.
member.param: The resulting zip will be placed in folder determined by this parameter.
The resulting zip will be named accordingly to this parameter.
In the process of export package creation a temporary folder is necessary. This parameter specifies path to the temp folder that will be used.
